channel.description: Recent content in Page on open collector

item.title: About
item.description: Hello, i’m Dave (I also go by david/davidk). I build cloud tooling and cloud infrastructure (bare metal on up) as a day job, mostly tailored to all things Linux. This bit holds nearly all of my spare time projects; mostly consisting of printables, software, and hardware. 3D Printables I build a lot of enclosures for breakout boards, as my workspace gets dusty. Maybe you’ve seen or used one in the wild?
